channel.title: Arcade on One Stop Pinball Shop
channel.description: Recent content in Arcade on One Stop Pinball Shop

item.title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Handmade Wood Edition
item.description: Handcrafted wooden edition - A unique 64x128 pixel dot matrix display (DMD) that combines artisanal craftsmanship with cutting-edge display technology. Each unit features a custom-built wooden housing, carefully handmade to bring warmth and character to your arcade or pinball setup.

item.title: Dot Matrix Display 64x128 - Industrial CNC Edition
item.description: Industrial CNC-machined edition - The ultimate 64x128 pixel dot matrix display (DMD) featuring a precision-manufactured housing created with advanced CNC machining technology. Every unit delivers uncompromising quality with perfectly machined tolerances and a professional finish.
